sense.gloss: sublimating (an emotion, impulse, etc.), channelling, diverting, converting, elevating

sdata.j: ↑物質↑↓ぶっしつ↓が↑直接↑↓ちょくせつ↓↑固体↑↓こたい↓から↑気体↑↓きたい↓に↑変↑↓か↓わる↑過程↑↓かてい↓を|↑昇華|↑↓しょうか↓という。
sdata.e: The process by which substances are turned directly from a solid state into a gas is called sublimation.
